text:
#Fasting-mimicking #diet enhances #tamoxifen efficacy in #breastcancer by lowering #blood #insulin and IGF1 with consequent inhibition of mTOR pathway responsible for #cancer cell proliferation.

@LaStatale & @SanMartino_Ge in @nature.
